author: Tahlia Roy
title: Want to adopt this little guy? Just make sure you can keep him post-pandemic
description: If you are stuck at home right now because of COVID-19 restrictions, you might be feeling bored — or even lonely — but animal rescue groups say those reasons aren't enough to adopt a new pet.
